statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT meter_id, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE location = 'New York' AND date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT date, time, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE meter_id = 1001 ORDER BY date, time DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE meter_id = 123 ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC
SELECT energy_usage, location FROM energy_consumption WHERE date > '2022-01-01' AND location LIKE '%New York%'
SELECT meter_id, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY meter_id ORDER BY total_energy_usage DESC
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE location IN ('California', 'Texas') AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy_usage, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM energy_consumption WHERE date >= '2022-06-01'
SELECT * FROM smart_meters;
SELECT meter_id, location FROM smart_meters ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE usage > 100 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT location, energy_usage FROM smart_meters WHERE energy_usage < 50;
SELECT meter_id, SUM(usage) AS total_usage FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY meter_id HAVING total_usage > 500;
SELECT * FROM smart_meters WHERE meter_id = 1;
SELECT location, energy_usage FROM smart_meters WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT em.meter_id, em.usage, sm.location FROM energy_consumption em JOIN smart_meters sm ON em.meter_id = sm.meter_id WHERE em.usage < 50;
SELECT * FROM smart_meters WHERE location LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT meter_id, AVG(usage) AS average_usage FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY meter_id HAVING AVG(usage) > 75;
SELECT * FROM smart_meters;
SELECT location, installation_date FROM smart_meters;
SELECT meter_id, energy_reading FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_meters WHERE meter_id = 1;
SELECT meter_id, reading_time, reading FROM meter_readings WHERE reading > 100 ORDER BY reading_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_meters WHERE meter_id = 1;
SELECT meter_id, location FROM smart_meters WHERE installation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT meter_id, energy_reading FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT smart_meters.location, meter_readings.reading_time, meter_readings.reading FROM smart_meters JOIN meter_readings ON smart_meters.meter_id = meter_readings.meter_id WHERE meter_readings.reading > 100;
SELECT meter_id, COUNT(*) AS total_readings FROM meter_readings GROUP BY meter_id HAVING total_readings > 5 ORDER BY total_readings DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_meters;
SELECT customer_id, location FROM smart_meters WHERE meter_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT reading_value, reading_date FROM meter_readings ORDER BY reading_date DESC;
SELECT meter_id, installation_date FROM smart_meters WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT meter_id, location, installation_date FROM smart_meters WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address, email FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT meter_id, reading_value, reading_date FROM meter_readings WHERE reading_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';

SELECT c.customer_name, m.location, e.consumption_amount FROM customer_info c JOIN smart_meters m ON c.customer_id = m.customer_id JOIN energy_consumption e ON m.meter_id = e.meter_id WHERE e.consumption_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM smart_meters;
SELECT location, energy_consumption FROM smart_meters WHERE energy_consumption > 100;
SELECT device_id, device_type FROM device_info ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT day_of_week FROM usage_patterns WHERE energy_consumed < 50;
SELECT * FROM anomalies WHERE anomaly_type = 'power outage' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_meters;
SELECT location, energy_consumption FROM smart_meters WHERE energy_consumption > 100;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_type, installation_date FROM device_info WHERE device_type LIKE 'Smart%';
SELECT meter_id, day_of_week, energy_consumed FROM usage_patterns WHERE day_of_week IN ('Monday', 'Tuesday') ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
